thread.title: Dog seriously hurt in altercation with skier in Aspen – The Denver Post
thread.title_full: Dog seriously hurt in altercation with skier in Aspen – The Denver Post

author: The Aspen Times
title: Dog seriously hurt in altercation with skier in Aspen – The Denver Post
text: February 23, 2017, 9:06 am Defending overall World Cup champion Lara Gut has had surgery on her injured left knee. As World Cup resumes, the overall title is Mikaela Shiffrin’s to lose February 22, 2017, 10:10 pm Shiffrin is bidding to become the youngest overall winner since Janica Kostelic in 2003, and it’s hard to foresee a scenario that would deprive her as long as she remains healthy. Colorado man skiing in Japan goes missing; search underway February 22, 2017, 9:58 pm A Colorado man skiing in Japan went missing on his last run of the day and efforts to find him, over three nights and days, have been unsuccessful. Eagle County investigators hope reward will help them find person who seriously hurt skier in Vail hit-and-run February 23, 2017, 10:46 am Eagle County authorities are searching for a person who struck and seriously injured a skier last week in a Vail Mountain hit-and-run.
